attributes.action: Block any attempt to provide Margaret Thatcher with a state funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I and many other working class people find the very idea of giving Thatcher a state funeral totally disgusting and offensive! Shame on you Gordon Brown for even entertaining the idea!

Some people must have very short memories. She told people to grab, grab, grab, look after number one and not to give a fig about anyone who was less fortunate. She destroyed our country and we're still reaping what she sowed. It's a very sad day indeed when a  Labour PM is  pushing forward plans to let her lie in state! She should pay for her own bloody funeral!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
